SeoM.ttl: Authority value of current page and the domain in SeoMoz base

Age.ttl: Minimal value on domain date registration or first log in web.archive.org. Data is taken from the recipdonor.com base.

Host.name: Host

Geo.name: Geography
Geo.ttl: Country and city where the website server is located

CMS.name: CMS
CMS.ttl: Analyzing the content of the page, it identifies the usage of the main popular "engines" for website administration: WP, Joomla, Drupal, TYPO3, DLE, Magento and others. The functionality of current option identification was borrowed from wappalyzer.com plug-in, and later was improved for a range of other Russian-language engines.

SocialNetworks.GooglePlus: Number of users by clicking the Google +1 for the current page in parentheses for the principal (Note that for the domain without www. will have different results).
SocialNetworks.Facebook: Number of users by clicking the Facebook "Like" for the current page in parentheses for the principal (Note that for the domain without www. Will have different results).
SocialNetworks.Twitter: Number of entries to Twitter, which refers to the address of the current page in parentheses for the principal (Note that for the domain without www. Will have different results). The data provides a service Topsy.com.
SocialNetworks.VK: Number of users by clicking the VKontakte "Like" for the current page in parentheses for the principal.

Visits.name: Monthly Traffic Reach
Visits.ttl: Estimated number of internet users who visited the site over the last six months according to SimilarWeb.

TimeOnSite.name: Time on Site
TimeOnSite.ttl: The average time of a visit according to SimilarWeb.

PagePerVisit.name: Page Views
PagePerVisit.ttl: Average number of views according to SimilarWeb.

BounceRate.name: Bounce Rate
BounceRate.ttl: Average % of bounce rate according to SimilarWeb.

CountryShares.name: Top Referring Countries
CountryShares.ttl: The visitors of the site come from according to SimilarWeb.

Sources.name: Traffic Sources
Sources.ttl: The main sources of desktop traffic for the site over the last three months according to SimilarWeb.

Referrals.name: Refferals
Referrals.ttl: Переходы с (на) других сайтов по данным SimilarWeb.

Referring.name: Leading Referring Sites:
Referring.ttl: Leading websites sending direct clicks to the site according to SimilarWeb.

Destinations.name: Leading Destination Sites:
Destinations.ttl: Websites where people were diverted to from the site according to SimilarWeb.

OrganicKeywords.name: Organic Keywords
OrganicKeywords.ttl: Leading Keywords which brought free desktop traffic to the site over the past three months according to SimilarWeb.
